name: Horde Siege - Defense as God of Archery
name_original: Horde Siege - Defense as God of Archery
description: Here we have a game very similar to Storm Ops 3, in which you try to protect your village from incoming enemies. You'll have to endure for 25 days, until the reinforcements come. Your main weapon is a bow and accurate shot. Gradually you will be able to unlock other improvements and so you'll be better prepared for enemies.
